item.title: Self Introduction
item.description:
Here is my first blog.

Interest

I’m interested in Computational Neuroscience, Psychology and AI.

$$ \tau_m \frac{dV}{dt} = -(V(t) - V_{rest}) + R \cdot I(t) $$

Where:

  • $\tau_m$ is the membrane time constant.
  • $I(t)$ is the input current.

This is the beauty of LaTeX rendering!
